attributes.action: Petition to prevent BBC harassing people who have no license because they have no TV set.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who have no TV licence because they have no TV set are regularly harrassed with threats that they will be referred the the "Enforcement Division for Investigation" if they do not answer a letter within a couple of weeks.

The non TV owner must supply their own envelope and stamp or pay their own phone call cost for the priveledge of not owning a TV set.

The letter is highly intimidating.

Most non TV holders are those with disabilities like the hard of hearing, the blind, those with TV set induced seizures.  They are made to feel intensely guilty that they do not have a set or license.

Others merely don't want a license - and why should they feel obliged to own a TV?

This petition is to stop innocent non TV owners being subjected to this harrassment and expense replying to these offensive letters.
